final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Customer
    end

    subgraph CarInsurer
        subgraph NotificationDepartment
            A[Claim Received]
            A --> B[Check completeness]
        end

        subgraph HandlingDepartment
            B --> |complete| C{XORGateway}
            C --> D[Register Claim]
            C --> |incomplete| A
            D --> E[Registered claim]
            E --> F{XORGateway}
            F --> |Not covered| G[Reject claim]
            F --> |Covered| H[Assess claim]
            H --> I{XORGateway}
            I --> |negative| G
            I --> |positive| J[Schedule payment]
            J --> K[Authorize repayment]
            K --> L{XORGateway}
            L --> M[Notify Customer]
            G --> M
            M --> N[Customer notified]
        end
    end

    subgraph Garage
    end

    %% Flows to external entities
    A --> |Claim documentation| ext1[Claim documentation]
    G --> |Notification letter| ext2[Notification letter]
    J --> |Authorization| ext3[Authorization]
    K --> |Payment details| ext4[Payment details]
